column1: #Text=Aang says : " I 'll figure this out , Katara .
#Text=I 'm sure they 're on their way back .
#Text=I bet they even found you a bunch of moon peaches for a treat .
#Text=" Aang says : " What am I supposed to do ?
#Text=Avatar Roku , how can I talk to you ?
#Text=I ca n't airbend in the Spirit World .
#Text=You do n't know where Sokka is , do you ?
#Text=I need to save my friend and I do n't know how !
#Text=Is there some way for me to talk to Roku ?
